posts.post_content:
May have minor creases, surface flaws, edge wear, corner dings, stains, I couldnt find any paperloss on this batch. Appear F-G, some a bit better. Backs; commensurate. 

Haven't seen the light of day in generations. Thanx, Steve

*Authenticity ONLY Guaranteed*.

Emails only plz; [url]fdnyladder7@comcast.net[/url]

[IMG]http://i30.photobucket.com/albums/c327/oche16/The%20Jane%20Collection/t206x140f-g.jpg[/IMG]

I purchased this lot solely for the Cobb (bat on).  I am taking offers, email only (ppgustafson@yahoo.com) on the remainder of the group (NO Cobb).  I will state the condition as Steve did "F-G" and accept offers as such.  However, the average condition is GD to VG, some slightly better and a very small number less (one beantown back stamp).  The group is being sold on the same terms as Steve's: "authenticity only" guaranteed and no returns, complaints.  The group is solid.  I have put each into a card saver I and they will be delivered as such.  Again, email offers only and payment to be made via check/money order - no paypal.  Steve's original pictures below.

Thanks
[url]ppgustafson@yahoo.com[/url]
